```{r 00-template-2, include = FALSE}

library(palmerpenguins)

```

`r chunk_reveal("penguin_tabs", widths = c(35,65), title = "# Breaks")`

```{r 00-template-3, include = FALSE}
penguins %>% 
  filter(year != 2007) %>% 
  group_by(species) %>% 
  summarize(across(starts_with("bill"), 
                   list(mean = mean, 
                        sd = sd),
                   .names = "{.fn}_{.col}",
                   na.rm = TRUE)) 
```

---

```{r 00-template-4, include = FALSE}
as_tibble(cars) %>%
  filter(speed > 4) %>%
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = speed) +
  aes(y = dist) + #BREAK
  geom_point(
    alpha = .8, 
    color = "blue" 
    ) + #BREAK
  aes(size = speed) #BREAK
```

`r chunk_reveal("my_cars", break_type = "auto", title = "# Chunk Breaks")`
